tags: None
review:
A month before the start of the lockdown, I had visited a reputable and trustworthy dentist that I had been visiting for years regarding a very small cavity that I wanted to be fixed. On consulting, it was indicated to me that I required the extraction of a wisdom tooth and the tooth that was bothering me was drilled into and filled up. Fast forward a few weeks after all of these procedures when the lockdown was in full force, I started experiencing severe, paralyzing pain in my ear that radiated through my head. On consulting an ENT, I was directed to have a dentist analyze the issue. As much as I tried, I was unable to reach the doctor that worked on my teeth and was then informed of Dr Anjana by a friend who was one of her previous patients.
On calling her, I was pleasantly surprised by her promptness and once I got off the phone with her, I was left feeling relieved and comforted. She immediately understood my concerns and dealt with them in a manner that was serious but simultaneously alleviated my intense worry. 
After a couple of weeks of constant online check-ins, she had me take an x-ray and consulted me in person (all the required safety precautions were observed) where we discovered that while drilling, the root of the tooth was touched and a filling was performed over the aggravation which only caused more damage and lead to the formation of a severe abscess, rendering the tooth dead. Through all the procedures that followed, Dr Anjana and her team were extremely prompt with following up, checking in and graciously answered any and all questions and concerns that I had. This situation of the pandemic had left me feeling helpless but Dr Anjana was constantly available and spontaneous. To say that I am satisfied and grateful would be an extreme understatement.
reply_text: Thanks for taking the time to give me such a datailed feedback Aparna. We are always happy to help in time of need.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor explains the treatment in layman terms which I could follow easily.  I was comfortable while the treatment was being done. Overall it was a nice experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My daughter is 10 years old and had to do root canal treatment. And a filling.
Being a parent I was really worried. But Dr Anjali and her team took things so efficiently into her hands and through various sitting not made my daughter s treatment go so smoothly but also made my daughter fall in love with her.
Well that was a wonderful experience.and suprise surprise she does not even charge for every sitting and is quite affordable
Keep it going Doctor Anjali.
reply_text: Thanks you Ms nirmala for your kind appreciation,it is heartwarming to know Michelya is happy and comfortable with the treatment procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Such patient hearing… understanding of the problem… explanation of the issue… and once the treatment starts… they make sure, you are so comfortable. 

Also once the root canal procedure was over… they took more x rays to make sure… it was all fine! 

And they take their time. No patients waiting… so if you have an appointment you’re given ample time. Best dentist experience to date.
reply_text: Thanks for that wonderful feedback Mahesh !! Really appreciate it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Anjana was very courteous and took time to explain all the problems with my dental hygiene. I have a night grinding problem and she helped me ordering my night guard and suggested I start with just lower jaw to see how it goes. 

Overall my experience was very positive and I’d come back again in future for any other treatment.
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback Mr Fahad. We are glad we were help you with your dental needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
It was my daughter Vrindha's first visit ever to the Dentist as she had developed cavities. I as a mother was more scared than my 7 years old daughter. But was amazed to see how good Dr.Alex & Dr.Anjana were with Vrindha in terms of explaining to her regarding oral health. she was so comfortable with them & got the tooth extracted without any tantrums.
I highly recommend Dr.Alex & Dr.Anjana as they are too good with kids.

tags: None
review: One of the kindest doctors you will ever meet. She is empathetic towards the patients problems and suggests the best solution after gauging. If you are terrified of pain like I was then leave your worries behind. She and her visiting doctors are very conscious of that fact and make sure you don't feel a prick. Good clean clinic in the middle of the city. A stones throw from MG road. Thank you Doctor.

tags: None
review: Good experience Dr Anjana , my concern was gum pain  ,, Dr explained me very well,. I have treated for gum pain

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
She was more a friend than a dentist. Such kindness and gentleness. 
She prepared me well and I knew just what to expect all the way. Of course there's pain the day after but during the procedure I could've taken a nap!
Thanks doc!
reply_text: Kaveri your calmness and patience made our work a lot easier. Was a pleasure treating you. Cheers

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Great doctor. I had severe sensitivity issue. The doctor found the root cause immediately, recommended a night guard and explained a dental routine to follow. My sensitivity has reduced to negligible in last 6-8 weeks. Highly recommend.
reply_text: Thanks Hetvi for your feedback, really happy your sensitivity issues are sorted and you are more comfortable. Dr Anjana
